question: [Calm] Francais: Identifiez the slope of the noisy line pour la droite tracee.

qas.question: [Calm] Francais: Identifiez the slope of the noisy line pour la droite tracee.
[Challenge] Portugues: Indique the intercept of the noisy line da linha representada.
[Explain] Portugues: Indique the value of y when x equals 1 da linha representada.
